main_definition: The act of using money to buy goods or services.

meanings_and_examples.example: I'm spending a lot on groceries this month due to inflation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Dedicating time or effort towards an activity
meanings_and_examples.example: She spent the whole weekend cleaning her house.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Allocating resources in a project or plan
meanings_and_examples.example: The budget was set to spend $50,000 on marketing for the new product launch.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Using money to purchase goods or services
meanings_and_examples.example: They spent their savings on a vacation to Hawaii.
He's spending time and money to learn Spanish, his new hobby.
